Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Nice looking place, ain't it? Haven't seen plants grow like this before. Name's $Actor_43$, now if you'll excuse me, I'm doing some appreciating.]
[Name:BAM][Text:Every once in a while, some beastie thinks I look like a snack. A quick whack to the head with a stone pestle will sort out most things. BAM! Hehe...][Default]

[Name:Mortar and Pestle][Text:I've found that there's not much in life that can't be solved with a sturdy mortar and pestle. Need a drink? It's a bowl. Door is stuck? Give it a smack. Someone giving you lip? Just imagine they're a stuck door.][Default]

[Name:Task_1_Start][Text:Yeah? Oh, you're looking for me? Would ya look at that, time flies don't it? Ok look, I need your help a bit yeah? I'm running way behind schedule, so it'd be a big favor for me if you gathered a few more $Item_162$ for me. Town is this way, yeah? I'll see you there!][SendToTown]
[Name:Task_1_End][Text:Is that $Item_162$ I smell? Knew I could count on you! This'll keep us stocked for a little bit as a base, but we'll need more ingredients to actually make anything.]

[Name:Task_2_Start][Text:You call this a town? More like a sad clump of buildings if you ask me... Lucky for you, I am an expert Apothecary. You build me a nice little home to call my own, and I'll see to it that the merchants have more than enough potions and unguents to keep them coming.][UnlockObjectID:18]
[Name:Collection][Text:I've been wanting one of these for years! Thanks.]
[Name:Gift_Happy][Text:For me? You sure you don't want it? Great, mine now.]
[Name:Gift_Sad][Text:Now why would you think I'd want one of these things?]

[Name:Gift_Miserable][Text:Nope. Don't want it, you can keep it.
Or maybe burn it.]
[Name:Family][Text:Potions run in my blood, my mother was an Apothecary, as was her mother. Now, great grandma Lotha was an executioner, but HER mother was also an apothecary.][Default]
[Name:Scaredy Cat][Text:That $Actor_20$ is such a big scaredy cat. He caught me searching for $Item_100$ in the evening. I didn't know your people could make noises like that!][Villager:20]
[Name:Fried chicken][Text:I like $Actor_12$, she's very pleasant, brings a certain air to the village. Unrelated, I've had such a craving for fried chicken.][Villager:12]
